title: The real new game mode
body: I work at riot games and im secretly posting this, the new game mode isnt what you think it is it is actually a map full of easter eggs and whoever finds all of the easter eggs wins and if you kill someone u take their eggs and you have a small chance of dropping an egg if you play bunny teemo it is an automatic win for you. You will find out more tommorrow...

replies.body:
No shit.

They posted about "N.U.R.F" before it came out, meaning it wasn't the April Fools.

So the REAL April Fools is the REAL U.R.F comes out.
